title: Memorable Date
description: Three text fields for easy date entry

frontMatter.title: Memorable Date
frontMatter.description: Three text fields for easy date entry

related.name: Date Input
related.description: Alternative date component with select boxes

when_to_use.value: Collecting dates in forms (birthdays, service dates, life events)
Scenarios where accessibility for assistive technology users is critical

content_considerations.value: Default hint text can be hidden via `remove-date-hint` attribute
Useful for workflows with many date inputs to reduce repetition
Extra hint text can be added for additional context

accessibility.value: Mixing field types (text + select) caused assistive technology issues
Default uses text inputs exclusively for accessibility
Previously tested against older accessibility criteria

frontMatter.code_usage:
<!-- Default with text inputs -->
<va-memorable-date
  label="Date of birth"
  name="dateOfBirth"
  required
></va-memorable-date>

<!-- With month select dropdown -->
<va-memorable-date
  label="Date of birth"
  name="dateOfBirth"
  month-select
  required
></va-memorable-date>
